description:
The people of North Carolina should have had their worries settled by now, but the fact that the Biden administration barely even pretended to care speaks volumes as to how much they are still suffering. Trump should not have had to visit the state because it should have already been taken care of. However, because the Biden Administration put foreign nationals first, hurricane victims were slapped in their faces as many remain homeless.

This is why Trump has announced plans to reform FEMA.

PRESIDENT TRUMP: "I'll also be signing an Executive Order to begin the process of fundamentally reforming and ov
title: Donald Trump has NOT forgotten North Carolina (unlike Democrats) and he let hurricane victims take the mic...

description:
As the saying goes, “Go woke, go broke.” And no company knows that better than Target.

Target is the latest company to ditch its DEI mandates. This follows many other American corporations, including Walmart, McDonald’s, Tractor Supply, and more.

BREAKING: Target is abolishing its DEI programs. The dominoes are starting to fall. h/t @lizcollin pic.twitter.com/gkuyaFVT2Q
— Christopher F. Rufo ⚔️ (@realchrisrufo) January 24, 2025
title: The latest company to ditch DEI now that Donald Trump is President? TARGET!
